# Panel

**Inherits:** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A GUI control that displays a [StyleBox](StyleBox.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**Panel** is a GUI control that displays a [StyleBox](StyleBox.md). See also [PanelContainer](PanelContainer.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->
